VariableDescription.Name: Status__C1_PP_WHI
VariableDescription.Header:
#              ************************************
#              *****    GLOBAL ATTRIBUTES    ******
#              ************************************
#
#     PROJECT                         STSP Cluster>Solar Terrestrial Science Programme, Cluster
#     DISCIPLINE                      Space Physics>Magnetospheric Science
#     VALIDITY                        Validated - major caveats
#     VALIDATOR                       Robot>CNRS-LPCE>guirriec@cnrs-orleans.fr
#     CAVEATS                         See also `TEXT' global attr. for Caveats file location
#                                     The following informations are issued from an automatic process
#                                     TBW
#     STATUS_KEY                      Status[0]= 0 = Bad data
#                                     Status[0]= 1 = Use with caution
#                                     Status[0]= 2 = OK
#                                     Status[0]= 255 = Not Supplied
#     SOURCE_NAME                     C1>Cluster spacecraft 1
#     DATA_TYPE                       PP>Prime Parameter
#     DESCRIPTOR                      WHI>Waves of High Frequency and Sounder for Probing of Density by Relaxation
#     DATA_VERSION                    01
#     TITLE                           WHISPER/E-Power>4-80 kHz/Electron Density from Relaxation Sounding
#     TEXT                            P. M. E. Decreau et al, WHISPER, A Resonance Sounder and Wave Analyser:
#                                     Performances and Perspectives for the Cluster Mission
#                                     Space Sci. Rev., 79,  pp 157 - 193, 1997)
#     MODS                            Produced in accordance with CSDS file specification
#                                     Reference Document for CSDS CDF File Design, DS-QMW-TN-0003
#     ADID_REF                        ECLUWHI1
#     LOGICAL_FILE_ID                 C1_PP_WHI_00000000_V01
#     LOGICAL_SOURCE                  C1_PP_WHI
#     LOGICAL_SOURCE_DESCRIPTION      Cluster Spacecraft 1, WHISPER Prime Parameters
#     MISSION_GROUP                   Cluster
#                                     !___Magnetospheric Data
#     PI_NAME                         P.M.E. Decreau
#     PI_AFFILIATION                  LPCE
#     ACKNOWLEDGEMENT                 Refer to CSDS for rules of acknowledgement
#     GENERATED_BY                    Cluster French Data Centre, CNES Toulouse
#     GENERATION_DATE                 2001-01-09:10.14.41
#     INST_MODE                       C1>WHI>0>2000-12-10T00:00:06.000Z>WEC_NBR_B_0>Wec basic
#                                     C1>WHI>297>2000-12-10T00:19:54.000Z>WEC_ERR>Error data gap
#                                     C1>WHI>298>2000-12-10T00:19:58.000Z>WEC_NBR_B_0>Wec basic
#                                     C1>WHI>11203>2000-12-10T12:27:02.000Z>WEC_ERR>Error data gap
#                                     C1>WHI>11204>2000-12-10T12:28:10.000Z>WEC_NBR_B_0>Wec basic
#                                     C1>WHI>12455>2000-12-10T13:51:54.000Z>WEC_NOT_EXE>Macro not executing
#     PARENTS                         RDM>0012101a
#     RULES_OF_USE                    Refer to CSDS for rules of use
#     SKELETON_VERSION                CSDS_CDF_V2.00
#     INST_SETTINGS                   TO BE OVERWRITTEN
#     INSTRUMENT_TYPE                 Radio and Plasma Waves (space)
#                                     Plasma and Solar Wind
#     SOFTWARE_VERSION                V5.5 / DEC-00
#     VALIDATE                        Compatible with the ISTP CDF Standards
#     SC_ENG_ID                       FM5>?
#     ALT_LOGICAL_SOURCE              Cluster-1_WHISPER_Prime-Parameters-PP_4sec_cdf
#     LINK_TITLE                      Important caveats to the use of Cluster Prime Parameter data
#                                     Cluster Science Archive
#     HTTP_LINK                       http://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/cdaweb/cluster_data_caveats.html
#                                     http://www.cosmos.esa.int/web/csa
#     SPASE_DATASETRESOURCEID         spase://VMO/NumericalData/Cluster-Rumba/WHISPER/PrimeParameter/4S
#
#              ************************************
#              ****  RECORD VARYING VARIABLES  ****
#              ************************************
#
#  1. Interval centred time tag rounded to nearest msecond
#  2. WHISPER status
#
#  
# Key Parameter and Survey data (labels K0,K1,K2) are preliminary browse data.
# Generated by CDAWeb on: Thu Jan 15 23:05:24 2015
VariableDescription.VariableInfo:
#
EPOCH                                STATUS[0]              STATUS[1]              STATUS[2]              STATUS[3]
                                (@_Status[0]_)         (@_Status[1]_)         (@_Status[2]_)         (@_Status[3]_)
dd-mm-yyyy hh:mm:ss.ms                                                                                             
10-12-2000 00:00:06.000                      1                      4                      0                      2
